reviewText:
These short classroom films were made way,way before my time but they are so much fun to watch. There is much to learn about American culture and attitudes through these films. I have shown this DVD to teachers I have now and they remember either showing these films in their classrooms back in the day or they recolllect having been shown these films by their teachers in the 60's.

I did recieve a defective DVD at first. I contacted the seller through Amazon and they were very courteous and quick to send send me a replacement
copy which plays very nicely.
